scripts.asbuild:calculator: npm run asbuild:calculator:debug && npm run asbuild:calculator:release
scripts.asbuild:calculator:release: yarn run generate:calculator:proto && yarn run generate:calculator:indexAndAbi && asc calculator/assembly/index.ts --target release --use abort= --config calculator/asconfig.json
scripts.asbuild:calculator:debug: yarn run generate:calculator:proto && yarn run generate:calculator:indexAndAbi && asc calculator/assembly/index.ts --target debug --use abort= --config calculator/asconfig.json
scripts.generate:calculator:indexAndAbi: CONTRACT_PATH=./calculator/ asc calculator/assembly/Calculator.ts --target debug --use abort= --config calculator/asconfig.json --transform ./node_modules/koinos-cdt-as/tools/koinos-contract-transform.js
